医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
白天嗜睡和热情低落可能与运动认知风险综合症有关根据 2024 年 11 月 6 日发表在《Neurology®》在线期刊上的一项研究，白天困倦或因睡眠问题而缺乏活动热情的老年人可能更容易患上导致痴呆的综合症。美国神经病学学会医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Daytime-sleepiness-and-low-enthusiasm-may-be-linked-to-motoric-cognitive-risk-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Daytime-sleepiness-and-low-enthusiasm-may-be-linked-to-motoric-cognitive-risk-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7bc9d38-51eb-4f4b-ac63-65e1985542bf Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:41:20 -0500 Daytime sleepiness and low enthusiasm may be linked to motoric cognitive risk syndrome
研究表明高血糖与糖尿病患者的血栓形成风险有关生物医学氧化还原过程研究中心（Redoxoma）进行的一项研究有助于了解高血糖（糖尿病的表现之一）如何导致血栓形成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-links-high-blood-sugar-to-thrombosis-risk-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Study-links-high-blood-sugar-to-thrombosis-risk-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbbcef40-776a-4c10-9874-b5e9b5a8672a Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:36:53 -0500 Study links high blood sugar to thrombosis risk in diabetes
恶病质诊断标准影响癌症患者的生存率保持良好的健康和福祉对于患者对癌症治疗的反应至关重要。不幸的是，恶病质或非自愿体重减轻是许多晚期癌症患者的主要担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Cachexia-diagnosis-criteria-affect-cancer-病人-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Cachexia-diagnosis-criteria-affect-cancer-病人-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47f04c01-1d0d-4b8d-8222-2df7d547180d Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:32:42 -0500 Cachexia diagnosis criteria affect cancer patient survival rates
许多退伍军人寻求迷幻药来治疗或精神探索大多数使用过迷幻药的美国退伍军人在最近的一项研究中报告称，他们寻求这些物质是为了治愈或精神探索，超过 80% 的人表示他们从这种经历中受益——即使是那些结果具有挑战性的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Many-veterans-pursue-psychedelics-for-healing-or-spiritual-exploration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Many-veterans-pursue-psychedelics-for-healing-or-spiritual-exploration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc9fd5b2-ed38-44a5-a611-5eae439808f4 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:26:37 -0500 Many veterans pursue psychedelics for healing or spiritual exploration
评论：胆红素在肝脏健康和疾病中的多方面作用胆红素是血红蛋白分解的副产物，特别是血红蛋白，是诊断、预测和治疗肝脏疾病的关键标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Review-The-multifaceted-roles-of-bilirubin-in-liver-health-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Review-The-multifaceted-roles-of-bilirubin-in-liver-health-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2449453c-de92-4630-a9c3-488e3ef2de4f Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:22:07 -0500 Review: The multifaceted roles of bilirubin in liver health and disease
新型可穿戴设备为皮肤提供身临其境的感官反馈西北大学领导的工程师团队开发了一种新型可穿戴设备，可以刺激皮肤传递各种复杂的感觉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-wearable-device-provides-immersive-sensory-feedback-on-the-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-wearable-device-provides-immersive-sensory-feedback-on-the-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14624836-912c-413a-9864-d625cc186ee3 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 21:18:18 -0500 New wearable device provides immersive sensory feedback on the skin
研究揭示粪便移植如何改善肠道健康约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员在一项新研究中鉴定了接受粪便移植的女性患者肠道中的男性染色体遗传物质，他们表示，他们极大地扩展了对其中一些移植如何成功和发挥作用的科学认识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Research-sheds-light-on-how-fecal-transplants-improve-gut-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Research-sheds-light-on-how-fecal-transplants-improve-gut-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=581606cc-8556-4a2e-a1c4-2f5f3df43617 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 20:48:34 -0500 Research sheds light on how fecal transplants improve gut health
DEEPscope 打破深部组织脑成像的障碍康奈尔大学的研究人员推出了一种先进的成像技术，能够以单细胞分辨率对大脑活动进行前所未有的深度和广域可视化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/DEEPscope-breaks-barriers-in-deep-tissue-brain-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/DEEPscope-breaks-barriers-in-deep-tissue-brain-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99557489-c798-44f5-87cc-3d55ce3e5c39 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 20:43:22 -0500 DEEPscope breaks barriers in deep-tissue brain imaging
斯坦福大学研究人员揭示了染色体外 DNA 在癌症中的关键作用斯坦福大学医学院研究人员及其国际合作者的三篇研究论文改变了科学家对小 DNA 循环的理解：直到最近被认为无关紧要而被驳回 -;是多种人类癌症的主要驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Stanford-researchers-unveil-the-key-role-of-extrachromosomal-DNA-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Stanford-researchers-unveil-the-key-role-of-extrachromosomal-DNA-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47b75b99-1ecb-4093-a93c-db47b2f9eb6f Wed, 06 Nov 2024 20:37:58 -0500 Stanford researchers unveil the key role of extrachromosomal DNA in cancer
水稻生物工程师揭示了 IL-12 免疫疗法失效的原因莱斯大学生物工程师团队开发了一个数学模型，阐明了为什么白细胞介素 12 (IL-12)（一种有望用于癌症治疗的强效免疫增强蛋白）在用作免疫治疗药物时会随着时间的推移而失去效力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Rice-bioengineers-uncover-why-IL-12-immunotherapy-loses-effectness-A-Team-Of-Rice-Bioengi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Rice-bioengineers-uncover-why-IL-12-immunotherapy-loses-effectness-A-Team-Of-Rice-Bioengi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5d4feae-9614-4d88-97f0-115e882b227a Wed, 06 Nov 2024 20:29:00 -0500 Rice bioengineers uncover why IL-12 immunotherapy loses effectiveness
